name: Super Space-Stronaut
description:
An old-school, 8-bit side-scrolling platformer. Taking place on a desolate, abandoned space station hovering in the outer reaches of our galaxy. 

You take control of the Space-Stronaut, a one-man army fighting to take back control of the station from the conqueror Aliens. Dip, Dive, and Jump through levels hunting for door keys, grabbing pick-ups, and killing monsters.

Created by Madeline Thornley

Proposed Modifications: 

Change in theme from space exploration to a Hellish environment inspired by the landscapes of Doom. 

Addition of a weapon for main character to shoot enemies. 

Addition of more dangerous traps and obstacles. 

Longer levels with more variety in theme and layout.
